website_summaries.verdict: A bargain swim cap for leisure or racing that also comes with free ear plugs and a nose clip.
pros: Color options include black, blue, and silver
Ergonomic design reduces resistance in the water
Comes with a carrying case, as well as a nose clip and ear plugs
cons: Some report that this option arrives either torn, or tears very easily

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it as a gift to my niece. She really loves it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JenSilver

customer_reviews.title: Great for large head
customer_reviews.text: It comes with ear and nose plugs which is a great addition. The hat is big volumed which fits my large head unlike most other swim hats. It also covers my ears completely which I like.
customer_reviews.author: A.L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great, perfect size for my 4 year old. Her hair is in braids with beads and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: B. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Great cap for my 5 year old great fit for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cap for my 5 year old great fit for her long hair
customer_reviews.author: Katherin

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: This cap gives a very tight fit and keeps my hair mostly dry, but it tends to snag a little as any silicone cap will. I recommend putting a barrier between the cap and your hair to prevent more snagging, like a hair band or lycra cap.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Vollendorf

customer_reviews.title: Not a satisfied customer not worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Didnt like this product it never stayed on the water kept seeping thru the ear plugs came out of my ear about 5 times after almost loosing them at the bottom of the swimming pool I gave up putting them in my ear which defeated the whole purpose of not having my ears pop the nose plugs were too tight this is just not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair and my old swim cap always get my hair wet. In addition the other issue was with that old swim cap, water can easily get into my ears. And this swim cap is indeed an upgraded version, I don’t need to worry about this wet hair or ears issues anymore, which thanks to its superb ergonomic design. I’m impressed. The cap is very tight during first few uses, but it is very stretchy so no problem to even fit my gigantic head : )
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: nice cap but.......
customer_reviews.text: the cap is very nicely made, however it is not waterproof. i used it to swim in a pool and my hair was wet, the cap did keep water out. worked with the cap to fit properly. i have long hair, which it held up while cap was on. DID NOT keep my hair dry from the water at all . so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: happy customer

customer_reviews.title: So great for curly hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love that my daughter’s hair comes out completely dry after swimming under water! We follow the curly girl method to keep her locks hydrated and being able to avoid exposure to chlorine is a huge plus for us!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair cap doesn't keep the hair dry
customer_reviews.text: Have not used the ear plugs and probably won't. The nose clip works great. The cap does not fit snugly enough. Maybe sizes should be offered. I get my hair in the cap fine but water seeps in around the ears. Back to the drawing board guys!
customer_reviews.author: Deltonagirl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Stay On
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be the perfect swim cap. Unfortunately that was not the case. By the second time my daughter goes under water in her swim class, this cap comes off her head. She has a full head of hair, lots of soft thick curls, so I thought it would fit tight enough to stay on but no it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Fit in size and nice material and satisfied
customer_reviews.text: As soon as this thing delivered i went for swimming it is made of of nice material and light weight cap. It has nose clip and earplugs in it. It covers all my hair and keeps dry and is tightly wrapped but with no pressure and its waterproof. I liked this product.
customer_reviews.author: dpak

customer_reviews.title: Short and small...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had ear infections from the time I was 2 years old. Hasn’t stopped me from swimming. I don’t go under the water, obviously no diving since I have a permanently perforated eardrum so at first glance this cap was appealing. I don’t have a big head, high school commencement cap was 7.25 inches. This cap is small and short and spent an entire swim pulling it down and dealing with an air bubble at the top of my head while wearing the cap. Inferior product. I had hoped to buy this cap in bulk since I swim 7 days a week.
customer_reviews.author: Fifi6161

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great. Product for the price. My 8 yr old daughter had a full thick curly hair and this holds it in.
customer_reviews.author: Darlyn

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work well for me. I have a lot of fine, thick (in terms of number) hair that tends to be on the silkier side. This just kept sliding off of my head. The quality seemed fine, just did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: For those of us with longer, thick hair, this is definitely a much improved swim cap. Keeps the water out, but doesn't feel like it's ripping out your hair with every move.
customer_reviews.author: Becki Kapla

customer_reviews.title: Pony tail swimming cap - but it hurts to put on.
customer_reviews.text: I simply can’t get the cap on my head. I was told by pool Female lifeguards at my Gym. - I just wet my hair. I don’t want my hair WER .... this is why I bought a swim cap. Ughb.
customer_reviews.author: Foreign Film Buff

customer_reviews.title: This cap is like not wearing any cap - worst swimming  cap
customer_reviews.text: This cap is worst swimming cap which I have seen. Bought 2 times & worst experience. First time it tore into pieces within a month, 2nd time also bad experience. it’s better to be without any cap than wearing this cap. Hair gets all wet like when we don’t wear cap. I don’t recommend this cap to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my daughter who has ear tubes. We use it along with ear plugs to reduce chance of water going in her ear. She liked it. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LunaMoon

customer_reviews.title: The description of this specific product DID NOT live up to what was described!!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment🤦🏾‍♀️the cap split in half as soon as I stretched it out to put on my head. I want a full refund or another cap @the expense of Amazon ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery on my head!
customer_reviews.text: This hat keep on falling off my head! It’s olay I will keep it but it slides off my head when I’m the pool I know I gotta little head but it’s okay!
customer_reviews.author: Casandra D. Linder

customer_reviews.title: Ripped in half
customer_reviews.text: The first time we went to put it on, we stretched it to fit over my daughter's head, and it literally ripped in half instantaneously. Piece of junk. I wish I could give it zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Works as  promised
customer_reviews.text: Be careful, requires small head - otherwise you going feel like being tortured by holy inquisition in 1540. That is head squeezed into pulp. People with big heads stay away, everyone else should buy this.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shoykhet

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Toddler!
customer_reviews.text: This hat does the job...keeps my daughter's hair dry and water out her ears...the pink is simply adorable!
customer_reviews.author: ScientificGal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit & reasonably priced for quality.
customer_reviews.text: My girls can get their hair twisted, braided, gorgeous, go swimming and take off cap and be just as gorgeous. Love love love producy
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a headache
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like it, i did actually work for a little but I still got my head wet a little in the back end close to the neck. It gave me a bad headache. Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: kryss L

customer_reviews.title: wet hair
customer_reviews.text: If you are someone who colors their hair and wants to keep it dry- keep looking-- this cap leaks all the way till your ears fill with water.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: OK swim cap
customer_reviews.text: This swim cap is a good quality material. It does fit over long hair well. It certainly does not keep the hair dry . It keeps it out of the swimmers face. it is a nice cap but does't live up to its representation.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for swim lessons
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for a 4 year old and an 8 year old. The 8 year old has a lot of hair it fit perfectly. It was great for the 4 year old as well. The caps stayed in place throughout the lesson and their hair stayed dry. I recommended it to several other parents who had their kids in the same swim classes. Good quality. My kids didn’t really use the nose or ear plugs but it was good to have them.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and won’t wet the hair, also great to cover ears... if you have long hair it will fit nicely
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Stays on strong!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter is black and her hair is thick but this cap stays on. Her hair stays dry. WOOOHOOOO!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ju-Juan Lacewell-Cason

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I used this at gge blacklight slide. It protect my hair from the glow water.
customer_reviews.author: lisa beasley

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow, that thing fits tight. Maybe I am not putting it on right, but the back of my hair gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: rpsav

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The cap was great until my moms big head busted it. The ear plugs were cool too but the nose plug was awful.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Very tight on head. Gives me a headache. Protects hair from chlorine water, but can’t wear it for long. I have an average size woman’s head.
customer_reviews.author: CentralCA

customer_reviews.title: Good cap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her swimming class. When she comes home her hair is dry. It does what it’s supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Passion

customer_reviews.title: Good for big hair
customer_reviews.text: Cute swim cap and fits larger or more hair, but it isn't water proof
customer_reviews.author: Zar S.

customer_reviews.title: Good cap for girls with long hair
customer_reviews.text: This really helps my daughter to keep her hair in place and dry. On top of that, it blocks the water from getting into her ears. For little kids, it seems to be one of the fear that water getting into their ears. So it helped with her concentration while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Grayorange

customer_reviews.title: Great! Just make sure it dries!
customer_reviews.text: it works great make sure to let it air dry tho or mold will grow on it
customer_reviews.author: Meryn McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Had used it 3 times and it ripped. Also didn’t really keep hair dry.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Roseman

customer_reviews.title: Maybe just a picky kiddo but not for us
customer_reviews.text: This pulled at my daughters hair so badly when we tried to put it on. She also couldn’t hear her instructor so that made class very hard to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the pool i travel and dirent wanted to wet my hair so i wouldn't have to blow dry my hair 😂
customer_reviews.author: stcroixgirl

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long hair!
customer_reviews.text: I got this cap to help keep my long hair dry when I swim but unfortunately this one doesn't work. The nose plug and ear plugs work great though.
customer_reviews.author: Mh

customer_reviews.title: Not right for my swimmer
customer_reviews.text: We just didn’t like the feel or for if his cap. It was way too tight and the ear wells are just weird. We sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Josie King

customer_reviews.title: Does Help with Preventing Water Entering Ears
customer_reviews.text: This swimming cap covers your ears. It's not air tight but it does help with preventing water entering your ears. Color is bright pink. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy_Z

customer_reviews.title: Fits kids as well.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 8 year old for swimming lessons, worked great and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: SweetRed8

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This cap is the truth! Not one lock of hair got wet, it stayed in place. I was really impressed. My daughter is 7 yr old with thick long hair fits nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Still pulls lots of hair
customer_reviews.text: My girl tried this one for a minute and in trying to adjust it, it not only pull her hair, but pull lots of hair out along the way. The material feels better than latex but it was just not what we were hoping for. We kept our latex swim cap.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Manuel Suarez Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has lots of hair,this is big enough for her.
customer_reviews.author: sherry c.

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter have a lot of hair and it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and roomy
customer_reviews.text: It’s made from strong material. I also like that it is roomy includes ear and nose plugs.
customer_reviews.author: Renewed Renee

customer_reviews.title: Feel comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This item help a lot . Try to hold my breath in the water , when I came out my hair never mess me after use this .And I love the small thing to protect my ear and nose .Make me feel better to stay in the water .
customer_reviews.author: Cc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice she wears it every day she swims now!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Armour

customer_reviews.title: Broke the 1st day of use
customer_reviews.text: This cap broke the very first day I attempted to use it. Its definitely not for long hair. It wouldn't stay snug on my head and slipped off before I even made it to the pool. It eventually broke forcing me to have wet hair for the duration of my swim class. Such a waste .....
customer_reviews.author: Tamikia D. Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the cap and the ear plugs, Can't wait to start my new aquatic routine
customer_reviews.author: Iris Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Its good but color faded partly after one week usage.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: Nice swim kit.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Cap fits a bit tight and my daughter complains it hurts after a while but that should probably be expected.
customer_reviews.author: JWDan

customer_reviews.title: Love the swim cap
customer_reviews.text: The nose plug was a little uncomfortable, but the cap and ear plugs were great.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Avila

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids but adults
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because it was supposed to be for my kids, but it is really big for an adult head. Great quality though
customer_reviews.author: Jones family

customer_reviews.title: Very waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Very tight and water proof! Love not having to wash my hair every time I swim🙂
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Evans

customer_reviews.title: 👎👎
customer_reviews.text: 👎👎Dont buy it doesn't work👎👎👎👎👎👎👎 Don't recomend this to anyone👎👎👎
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Great for my mom to swim in
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mom and she loves it - she uses it 4 times a week at the YWCA pool
customer_reviews.author: R U IRIE

customer_reviews.title: Water still go under cup and makes your hair wet.
customer_reviews.text: I order this cap for long hair when swimming. However was disappointed when my hail was wet after I removed cap. I didn't dive or go deep under water. Sorry but I need to return product.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya P

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t stay in place and water got my hair wet
customer_reviews.author: Vanja

customer_reviews.title: fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very good swim cap, it keeps water mostly out of my hair and doesn't slip off, perfectly fit my head and also keep my ear dry too. Very comfortable, i would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: I like white swimming cap and it is really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like white swimming cap and it is really comfortable. I dont like my hair getting wet when i swimming. My husband has black one, and i have this white, so we both think our swimming caps are really match. lol. highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Icy Yang

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Too big to wear. Does not seal the water and uncomfortable with goggles.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: A Must have !!
customer_reviews.text: Works well! Keeps water from flushing the ears. Adults and kids fitted.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Water did get in the cap and ruined my daughter hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nastashia

customer_reviews.title: Ripped swim cap
customer_reviews.text: I had this for only 3 swim lessons and it ripped right down the side , very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Corley

customer_reviews.title: Kept my hair dry
customer_reviews.text: This swimming cap kept my shoulder length hair dry in the pool and in the ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Bettina. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried the product yet but the quality looks good so far so good
customer_reviews.author: reetz

customer_reviews.title: Too Small for an adult woman
customer_reviews.text: This cap is too small to put up. Have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised as cap for long-haired swimmers
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say "I hate it," which is what one star indicates, but I'd say that this swimming cap is definitely not designed for long haired swimmers. It's too tight and I ended up not using it. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I loved it until it ripped after only wearing a few ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until it ripped after only wearing a few times. But while it worked it was awesome, I’ll probably order another.
customer_reviews.author: Suzana

customer_reviews.title: Ripped up the back
customer_reviews.text: I wore it once, I have to say it did keep my hair dry but the second time I went to put it on, it split right up the back. luckily returns are easy and I may try again. Maybe I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: CindiK108

customer_reviews.title: Ripped my hair out!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo very tight. Never used it. Felt awful, looks awful, fits awful. Sorry, cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: EGM

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to put it on and water seeped in while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Not a keeper
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter. Although her hair is not completely wet , her hair is still wet enough to really defeat the purpose of wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Not a good cap for my 6 1/2 year old
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of extra material and lets in water on the sides. Not a good cap for my 6 1/2 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The nose plugs were a nice addition, but this cap doesn't keep your hair dry at all.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Granny looking
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this too thick to stretch and I look like a granny in hot pink
customer_reviews.author: Dith

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have long hair, this is the best swimming cap. It fits perfectly and there's room. I may look like a "cone head," but my hair will dry. The effect is very good! Put it on carefully. My hair is not wet at all. I jump from the cliff into the sea
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca McNear

customer_reviews.title: Wearable everyday
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cap .Perfect fit, easy to put on and best of all kept the hair dry thereby reducing the need to wash and condition after a swim! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmeen Midi-Smith

product_meta.title: PHELRENA Swimming Cap Waterproof Premium Silicone Solid Long Hair Earmuffs Swim Cap Flexible Reversible for Adults Kids Women Men, Keeps Hair Clean Ear Dry, Free with Nose Clip and Ear Plugs
feature_bullets: THE BEST QUALITY IMPORTED MATERIAL - This swimming cap is made of 100% high quality non-toxic silicone that is highly flexible and extremely resistant, it is super non-slip and water-tight. The swimming cap has been continuously testing by professional swimming trainer. Lightweight, latex-free silicone provides durable performance and optimum fit.Compared with latex, it is not only non-toxic and tasteless, but also friendly to the skin.

ERGONOMIC BEST DESIGN - A streamlined design is to enhance water flow speed, eliminate the resistance, performance optimization. A streamlined design is to enhance water flow speed, eliminate the resistance, performance optimization. This design of swim cap can be TIGHTLY WRAPPED in your head BUT NO PRESSURE, greatly expanded your head space. This easy on-and-off design won't snag hair.

UNIQUE FEATURES OF THE SWIMMING CAP - The PHELRENA swimming cap, lightweight, good elasticity, easy stretch, no deformation. It can stretches perfectly, Waterproof,doesn't tear, and has a high wear resistance.Suitable for all swimmers no matter you are adults, kids, women, men, boys, girls and you don’t need to worry about long hair or short hair.

WIDELY USED & COMPLETE ACCESSORIES - The swimming cap is often used in outdoor sports or a top professional game. In particular, freestyle, synchronized swimming, water polo, and even water Iron Triathlon. The swim cap comes packaged in bag. Package also includes 1 nose clip and 2 ear plugs.

RECOGNIZE THE BRAND, LIFELONG WARRANTY - Please recognize our brand name"PHELRENA", we did not authorize any stores to sell our items. Your shopping experience is the driving force of our do better products. if our products bring your any trouble, please contact with us for free, we offer you a 90-DAY 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE.
